node.title: ThreeFold is Attending the AIBC Summit in Dubai
node.excerpt: Our co-founder Kristof will be giving a keynote and some of our team will be at the expo hall!

node.title: Update on the Binance Smart Chain Integration
node.excerpt: We are happy to update that the BSC integration is going just as planned and next week, TFT will be available there.

node.title: Dash & Dash NEXT partner with ThreeFold
node.excerpt: Dash, Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.

node.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

node.title: Harmony Integrates with ThreeFold’s Decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: Harmony and ThreeFold will work together on developer and user projects on the ThreeFold Grid and Pangaea..

node.title: ThreeFold partners with SKALE to empower its developer community
node.excerpt: SKALE and ThreeFold are excited to announce their collaborative partnership that will focus on solving scalability and decentralization limitations faced by Ethereum and Blockchain developers.

node.title: TFT is more accessible; now available via PancakeSwap and a BTC Integration on ThreeFold Connect
node.excerpt: Today, the bridge to BSC is live, making TFT available on PancakeSwap! And anyone can now buy TFT with BTC directly on the ThreeFold Connect app.

node.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
node.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.

node.title: Bridges Connecting the ThreeFold Ecosystem to External Networks
node.excerpt: Since the launch of ThreeFold Grid 3.0, TFT is now available on three blockchains – Stellar, Binance Smart Chain and the Substrate-based ThreeFold Blockchain (aka TF Chain).

node.title: Solving the Blockchain Dilemma
node.excerpt: Blockchain technology has the power to change the world of IT. There are a huge number of new initiatives using blockchain technology around the world, with countless use cases.

node.title: What Bitcoin did to money, ThreeFold is doing to the Internet
node.excerpt: As the Internet is struggling with issues due to its centralized model, ThreeFold spent the last six years developing a new open-source peer-to-peer Internet infrastructure from the ground up.

node.title: An Intro to the ThreeFold Token
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token (TFT) is a decentralized digital currency used to buy autonomous and decentralized Internet services (compute, storage, and application) on the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Two: Akash
node.excerpt: This post is the second one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. This time, we're looking into Akash!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part One: Dfinity
node.excerpt: This post is the first one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. First up – Dfinity!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Four: Storj
node.excerpt: Follow me to the fourth stop on my journey through the space. This time, we’re looking into Storj!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Three: Filecoin
node.excerpt: This post is the third one in a series to look into fellow projects and their solutions to better understand the space we operate in and how ThreeFold stands out. This time, we're taking a closer look at Filecoin!

node.title: Our Quest to Fully Decentralize the Internet
node.excerpt: It's our mission to transform the Internet and Cloud. Learn more about the status quo and how we're working on fully decentralizing the entire Internet!

node.title: Stake TFT and Become a ThreeFold Validator
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people. Anyone can become a validator and participate in the decentralization of the Internet economy.

node.title: Introducing the TF (Chain) Admin Portal – for farmers and grid users!
node.excerpt: Last week, we shared an update on what's new in TF Grid 3.0.1 – and the path to mainnet! There's been a lot of exciting progress by the team, and we wanted to share more details with you, starting with the admin portal!

node.title: The ThreeFold Blockchain
node.excerpt: The third release of the ThreeFold Grid represents a major step in the decentralization of the People’s Internet with the Smart Contract for IT coming to life on the ThreeFold Blockchain (aka “TF Chain”).

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid 3.x Explorer UI
node.excerpt: The Explorer was designed to provide a simple way for anyone to find decentralized Internet capacity on the ThreeFold Grid, and we’re thrilled to announce a new user interface for Grid 3.x on both testnet and devnet!

node.title: ThreeFold’s 2021 Review and 2022 Preview
node.excerpt: It was an important year for ThreeFold, with huge developments on the ThreeFold Grid, the continued expansion of the grid by farmers, key partnerships, and more – all setting up for a strong 2022!
